# Introduction
EQ-5D Data doesn't look to be available for 2015 and 2016 - for these years it is probably part of the dataset that requires secure access.  

The task for the code in this function will be to read the appropriate pre-calculated Eq-5d variables and if nesessary to re-calculate the tariff from the component variables.
